EmailTemplate.description: Your menu update request could not be processed
EmailTemplate.name: FP MY Menu Change - Could not be processed - Deflection
EmailTemplate.subject: Kemaskini Menu anda tidak boleh diproses Your Menu update request could not be processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Kepada Rakan Kongsi,
Terima kasih untuk permintaan anda. Maafkan kami kerana permintaan anda tidak dapat diproses. Sila layari Pengurusan Menu (Menu Management) di Portal Restoran (Restaurant Portal) untuk mengemaskini menu anda dengan hanya beberapa klik. Permintaan anda akan disemak semula oleh Pasukan Kawalan Kualiti kami dalam tempoh 2 hari.
- Klik sini untuk log masuk ke Menu Management https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/menu-management-pd
- Klik sini jika anda terlupa kala laluan anda https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/reset-password
- Klik sini untuk permintaan log masuk https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_malaysia
Sekian, Pasukan foodpanda anda
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear Partner,
Thank you for your submission. Unfortunately we cannot process your request. Please head on over to Menu Management in Restaurant Portal to update your menu with just a few clicks. Your request will be reviewed within 2 business days by our Quality Control team.
- Click here to log in to Menu Management https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/menu-management-pd
- Click here if you forgot your password https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/reset-password
- Request for your login details here https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_th
Cheers, Your foodpanda team
